Body:
sim_pattern_uni = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=10.0, regions=[
    (2, 4, 0, 5)])
image1 = sim_pattern_uni.simulate_ci_pre_cti(shape=(5, 7))
sim_pattern_non_uni = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=10.0,
    regions=[(2, 4, 0, 5)], row_slope=0.0)
image2 = sim_pattern_non_uni.simulate_ci_pre_cti(column_deviation=0.0,
    shape=(5, 7))
assert (image1 == image2).all()
